statements: SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_id DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT contact_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM vendors WHERE contact_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id >= 5 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, contact_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name NOT LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY vendor_name, contact_name;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor_name FROM vendors WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendor_info WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM delivery_tracking WHERE delivery_id = 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_quantity FROM vendor_info JOIN delivery_tracking ON vendor_info.vendor_id = delivery_tracking.vendor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_deliveries FROM delivery_tracking WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendor_info;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_address FROM vendor_info ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_date, delivery_quantity FROM vendor_info JOIN delivery_tracking ON vendor_info.vendor_id = delivery_tracking.vendor_id WHERE delivery_quantity > 10;
SELECT vendor_name, delivery_status FROM vendor_info JOIN delivery_tracking ON vendor_info.vendor_id = delivery_tracking.vendor_id WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';

SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact, delivery_date, delivery_quantity, delivery_status FROM vendor_info JOIN delivery_tracking ON vendor_info.vendor_id = delivery_tracking.vendor_id ORDER By delivery_date ASC, delivery_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_name FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT contact_email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM deliveries ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM deliveries WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 1;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE contact_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT delivery_id, vendor_id, delivery_date, item_name, quantity FROM deliveries WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, item_name, quantity FROM deliveries WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT restock_id, delivery_id, restock_date, restock_quantity FROM restocking ORDER BY restock_quantity ASC, restock_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendor ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE price < 50;

SELECT vendor.vendor_name, product.product_name, delivery.delivery_date FROM vendor INNER JOIN product ON vendor.vendor_id = product.vendor_id INNER JOIN delivery ON product.product_id = delivery.product_id;

SELECT vendor_name, SUM(current_stock) AS total_stock FROM vendor INNER JOIN product ON vendor.vendor_id = product.vendor_id INNER JOIN stock ON product.product_id = stock.product_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM vendor;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT vendor.vendor_name, product.product_name, delivery.delivery_date, delivery.quantity FROM ((vendor JOIN product ON vendor.vendor_id = product.vendor_id) JOIN delivery ON product.product_id = delivery.product_id);

SELECT vendor.vendor_name, SUM(delivery.quantity) AS total_quantity FROM vendor JOIN product ON vendor.vendor_id = product.vendor_id JOIN delivery ON product.product_id = delivery.product_id GROUP BY vendor.vendor_name;

SELECT delivery.delivery_date, product.product_name, stock.current_stock FROM delivery JOIN product ON delivery.product_id = product.product_id JOIN stock ON product.product_id = stock.product_id WHERE stock.current_stock < 50;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT vendor_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY vendor_id;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_email FROM vendors WHERE contact_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(*) AS products_count FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT products.product_name, deliveries.delivery_date, deliveries.quantity FROM products JOIN deliveries ON products.product_id = deliveries.product_id ORDER BY deliveries.delivery_date DESC;

SELECT supplier_name, restock_date FROM suppliers JOIN products ON suppliers.supplier_id = products.vendor_id JOIN restocks ON products.product_id = restocks.product_id WHERE restock_quantity > 10 ORDER BY restock_date ASC;
